titles.title: Social Services Block Grant Restoration Act of 1993
A bill to increase the funds available under title XX of the Social Security Act for block grants to States for social services, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6852-6853)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/28/1993--Introduced. Social Services Block Grant Restoration Act of 1993 - Amends title XX (Block Grants to States for Social Services) of the Social Security Act to authorize increased appropriations under such title.
